androidx.test.espresso.base

Class IdlingResourceRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.test.espresso.base.IdlingResourceRegistry

  • public final class IdlingResourceRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of user-registered IdlingResources. Consider using IdlingRegistry instead of this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IdlingResourceRegistry(Looper looper)

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Registers the given resources.
      void sync(java.lang.Iterable<IdlingResource> resources, java.lang.Iterable<Looper> loopers)
      Ensures that this idling resource registry is in sync with given resources by registering/un-registering idling resources as needed.
      boolean unregisterResources(java.util.List<? extends IdlingResource> resourceList)
      Unregisters the given resources.

    • Method Detail

      • sync

        public void sync(java.lang.Iterable<IdlingResource> resources,
                 java.lang.Iterable<Looper> loopers)
        Ensures that this idling resource registry is in sync with given resources by registering/un-registering idling resources as needed.

      • registerResources

        public boolean registerResources(java.util.List<? extends IdlingResource> resourceList)
        Registers the given resources. If any of the given resources are already registered, a warning is logged.
        Returns:
        true if all resources were successfully registered

      • unregisterResources

        public boolean unregisterResources(java.util.List<? extends IdlingResource> resourceList)
        Unregisters the given resources. If any of the given resources are not already registered, a warning is logged.
        Returns:
        true if all resources were successfully unregistered

      • registerLooper

        public void registerLooper(Looper looper,
                           boolean considerWaitIdle)

      • getResources

        public java.util.List<IdlingResource> getResources()
        Returns a list of all currently registered IdlingResources. This method is safe to call from any thread.
        Returns:
        an ImmutableList of IdlingResources.

Generated javadoc for the new package structure to make it clearer which packages are bundled with the Android operating system, and which are packaged with your app's APK. Going forward, the android.* package hierarchy will be reserved for Android packages that ship with the operating system; other packages will be issued in the new androidx.* package hiearchy.
